autoplay.description: Whether or not to switch automatically

dotPosition.description: The panel indicates the position of the point, and can select 'top', 'bottom', 'left' right
dotPosition.description_zh: 面板指示点位置，可选 `top` `bottom` `left` right

dots.description: Whether to display the panel indicator point, and if 'object' you can also specify 'dotsClass' or
dots.description_zh: 是否显示面板指示点，如果为 `object` 则同时可以指定 `dotsClass` 或者

waitForAnimate.description: Whether to wait for the animation to be switched

afterChange.description: Toggle the callback of the panel

beforeChange.description: Toggle the callback of the panel

methods.name: goTo(slideNumber, dontAnimate)
methods.description: When switching to a specified panel, dontAnimate = true, no animation is used
methods.description_zh: 切换到指定面板, dontAnimate = true 时，不使用动画
